title: Agatha Christie's Marple (2007-2009) Series 03 - 4 SD Episodes
description:
Agatha Christie's Marple (2007-2009) Series 03 - 4 SD Episodes


Series Description Courtesy Of:

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agatha_Christie's_Marple" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agatha_Christie's_Marple</a>


Agatha Christie's Marple (or simply Marple) is a British ITV television series based on the books and short stories by British crime novelist Agatha Christie. The title character was played by Geraldine McEwan from the first to third series, until her retirement from the role, and by Julia McKenzie from the fourth series onwards.

Each series consists of four feature-length episodes, except series six which only has three episodes. The first six episodes were all adaptations of Miss Marple novels by Christie. Subsequent episodes were derived both from works featuring Miss Marple but also Christie novels that did not feature the character. The title of the series removes the word Miss from Miss Marple, to match the title of the Agatha Christie's Poirot series.

Following the conclusion of the sixth series, it was announced that the BBC had acquired the rights for the production of Agatha Christie adaptations, suggesting that ITV would be unable to make a seventh series of Marple.

2007-09-23 - At Bertram's Hotel (Video:H264 720x364, 903kbps, 29fps - Audio:AAC 44.1kHz, 139kbps)

Miss Marple leaves St. Mary Mead for a trip to London's elite, Victorian, and "too good to be true" Bertram's Hotel, where she used to spend her holidays as a child. Soon after her arrival, a maid is found murdered on the roof and Miss Marple tries to uncover the truth with the help of another maid.


2007-09-30 - Ordeal By Innocence (Video:H264 720x364, 900kbps, 29fps - Audio:AAC 44.1kHz, 139kbps)

Old wounds are reopened for the Argyle family when a man suddenly turns up after being abroad and claims that the black sheep of the family could not have murdered its tyrannical matriarch.


2008-08-03 - Towards Zero (Video:H264 720x416, 902kbps, 29fps - Audio:AAC 44.1kHz, 137kbps)

A wealthy woman holds a party at her Devon estate for family and friends, including old schoolmate Miss Marple. When a solicitor and the hostess herself are both murdered, Miss Marple tries to find a clever killer with a devious plan.


2009-01-01 - Nemesis (Video:H264 640x352, 896kbps, 25fps - Audio:AAC 44.1kHz, 118kbps)

Jason Rafiel, an old friend of Miss Marple's, dies and leaves her an unusual legacy, to grant his final wish: she has to uncover a possible murder that may or may not have happened already. All she gets are two tickets to a Mystery Bus Tour and the advice to invite someone trustworthy to the bus trip, the only thing she knows about the crime being the single word 'nemesis'.
